Package it.polimi.ingswPSP35.server.controller.divinities

Class Divinity

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingswPSP35.server.controller.divinities.Divinity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Apollo, Ares, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Charon, Demeter, Hephaestus, Hera, Hestia, Limus, Minotaur, Pan, Prometheus
public abstract class Divinity
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides default behaviour for all actions a divinity cards share, but doesn't specify the order in which they can be taken. This includes moving, building and checking for victory.

This class has a reference to two of the main logical components of the game: Board and divinityMediator, both of which are shared between all divinities engaged in the same match. Specifically, these references are passed during the setup phase by calling two setter methods.

The order in which actions can be taken is decided by the AbstractTurn implementation returned by the abstract method getTurn().

This class also has a referenced to an instance of Winner class shared by all the divinities involved in the same match. This class is used to handle win conditions and the end of the game.

Author:
Paolo Galli
See Also:
Board, AbstractTurn, DivinityMediator

    Fields

    protected Board board

    protected Worker selectedWorker
    Worker selected at the beginning of each turn to attempt actions.
    protected Winner winner
    Winner instance shared by all divinities in the same match to handle victory.

  • Method Details

    • setWinner

      public void setWinner​(Winner winner)
      Setter for Winner parameter. Only called at during setup once per game.
      Parameters:
      winner - Winner instance for the current game

    • getName

      public abstract java.lang.String getName()
      Method used to identify divinities. It returns this Divinity's name as it is spelled in the official rulebook (in english), starting with a capital letter. This also coincides with the class name.
      Returns:
      Divinity's name

    • setDivinityMediator

      public void setDivinityMediator​(DivinityMediator divinityMediator)
      Setter for DivinityMediator parameter. Only called during setup once per game after the mediator has been decorated by all Divinities.
      Parameters:
      divinityMediator - DivinityMediator to be set

    • selectWorker

      public boolean selectWorker​(Coordinates workerCoordinates)
      Method called at the start of each turn to determine which Worker will take actions
      Parameters:
      workerCoordinates - coordinates of the chosen Worker
      Returns:
      true if the square corresponding to workerCoordinates contains a Worker of this Divinity

    • getSelectedWorker

      public Worker getSelectedWorker()
      Getter for selectedWorker field. It's called only by DefeatChecker to be able to restore this Divinity's state.
      Returns:
      selectedWorker field
      See Also:
      DefeatChecker

    • setBoard

      public void setBoard​(Board board)
      Setter for board field. It's called only by DefeatChecker to be able to restore this Divinity's state.
      Parameters:
      board - Board instance shared by all Divinity instances in the same game

    • decorate

      public DivinityMediator decorate​(DivinityMediator toDecorate)
      Method called during setup to allow each divinity to decorate a shared DivinityMediator.
      Parameters:
      toDecorate - DivinityMediator to decorate
      Returns:
      a decorated version of toDecorate if the divinity has decorated it, toDecorate otherwise

    • move

      public boolean move​(Coordinates destinationCoordinates)
      Attempts to move selectedWorker to Square destination. If the attempt is successful, the board is notified of what squares have been affected by the move action.
      Parameters:
      destinationCoordinates - the Square one wishes to move to
      Returns:
      true if the move action attempt was successful

    • canMove

      protected boolean canMove​(Worker worker, Square workerSquare, Square destination)
      Verifies if it is possible to move worker from its current Square workerSquare to Square destination.
      Parameters:
      worker - Worker to be moved
      workerSquare - the Square worker is on
      destination - Square of destination
      Returns:
      true if the move action is allowed, false otherwise

    • build

      public boolean build​(Coordinates targetCoordinates)
      Attempts to build from selectedWorker to Square target. If the attempt is successful, the board is notified of what squares have been affected by the build action.
      Parameters:
      targetCoordinates - the Square one wishes to build on
      Returns:
      true if the build action attempt was successful

    • canBuild

      protected boolean canBuild​(Worker worker, Square workerSquare, Square target)
      Verifies if it is possible to build worker from its current Square workerSquare to Square target.
      Parameters:
      worker - Worker to be moved
      workerSquare - the Square "worker" is on
      target - the Square one wishes to build on
      Returns:
      true if the move action is allowed

    • checkWin

      protected void checkWin​(Worker worker, Square current, Square origin)
      Verifies whether worker has won by performing an action from Square origin to Square current. If that's the case, this instance will call a method of the shared Winner class to declare itself the winner.
      Parameters:
      worker - Worker that has performed and Action
      current - Square that contains worker
      origin - Square that worker was on before performing an action

    • getTurn

      public AbstractTurn getTurn()
      Returns an implementation of AbstractTurn specific to the concrete Divinity that implements this method
      Returns:
      an implementation of AbstractTurn

    • placeWorker

      public boolean placeWorker​(Worker worker, Coordinates coordinates)
      Method called during setup to check whether worker can be placed on a given Square (identified by coordinates).
      Parameters:
      worker - worker to be placed
      coordinates - Coordinates of the Square one wishes to place worker on
      Returns:
      true if worker has been placed on the Square identified by coordinates, false otherwise
